title: FS: Cy Young (Glove) SGC 6.5, extremely rare back....Price reduced!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: Cy Young (Glove) SGC 6.5, extremely rare back....Price reduced!
posts.post_content: Extremely scarce SCap 460 fact. 25 back....PSA POP Report shows only six of all grades of this back (4 of those are only PSA 1's!) One month ago an SGC 6 with a normal SCap 350/30 back sold on Ebay for $3100, this card is an SGC 6.5 with a near impossible back..... Current PSA SMR prices are $3000 for a PSA 6, and $7300 for a PSA 7. Offered at $4500 delivered......Effective 11/17- Price reduced to $4300, or very close fair offer, thanks... **SOLD**
Price and updated population reports have been added....Thanks
